welcome.title: Welcome to Mailrecap.co
welcome.subtitle: Helping you to take care of your mail

home.title: Mailrecap.co
home.scanDescription: Scan and read your mail instantly

privacyTerms.title: Privacy & Terms
privacyTerms.body:
By continuing, you agree to Mailrecap.co's Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.

Summaries are generated using AI and may not always be accurate.

Mailrecap.co does not provide legal, financial, or medical advice.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect photos of your mail, generated summaries, and basic account info (name, email, subscription status).

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.content:
Photos are processed using AI to generate summaries.

Summaries are stored in your account archive for your review.

dataStorage.title: Data Storage
dataStorage.content:
Data may be stored locally on your device or securely in the cloud.

All data is encrypted in transit.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content:
We do not sell your personal data.

Data may be shared with service providers (e.g., AI processing, cloud hosting) as needed to deliver the service.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: You can request deletion of your account and associated data at any time.

useOfService.title: Use of Service
useOfService.content:
Mailrecap.co provides AI-generated summaries of postal mail for convenience.

Summaries are for informational purposes only.

noAdvice.title: No Legal, Financial, or Medical Advice
noAdvice.content:
Mailrecap.co is not a substitute for professional legal, financial, or medical advice.

Users remain responsible for verifying the contents of their mail.

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions & Billing
subscriptions.content:
Subscription payments are processed through Apple App Store or Google Play.

You can cancel anytime in your account settings.

Refunds are subject to Apple/Google policies.

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.content:
Do not upload illegal, harmful, or offensive content.

Ensure your device and account remain secure.

liability.title: Liability Disclaimer
liability.content:
Mailrecap.co is not responsible for missed payments, deadlines, or consequences arising from AI-generated summaries.

The app is provided "as is" without guarantees of accuracy.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: Terms may be updated periodically. Continued use of the app means acceptance of updated terms.

subscriptionPlan.title: Choose Your Plan
subscriptionPlan.subtitle: Select the plan that works best for you
subscriptionPlan.selectPlan: Please select a plan to continue
subscriptionPlan.legalFootnote: Subscriptions are billed through your App Store or Google Play account. You can cancel anytime in your account settings. Refunds are handled by Apple/Google.

cameraPermission.title: Camera Access Needed
cameraPermission.subtitle: To read your mail, we need access to your camera
cameraPermission.explanation: This lets you take photos of your letters so we can read them to you.
cameraPermission.photosDesc: Save and review your mail photos
cameraPermission.privacy: Your privacy is protected. Photos stay on your device.
cameraPermission.disclaimer: Mailrecap.co uses your camera to scan letters. Photos are processed securely to generate summaries. Accuracy is not guaranteed. Please verify important details yourself.

camera.title: Take Photo of Mail
camera.instructions: Position your mail inside the dotted box below, then tap the button to take a photo

mailSummary.title: Mail Summary
mailSummary.askSuggestions: Would you like suggestions for what to do next?
mailSummary.disclaimer: This summary was generated using AI. Accuracy is not guaranteed. Mailrecap.co is not responsible for missed payments, deadlines, or actions taken based on summaries.

archive.title: Saved Mail
archive.emptyDesc: Take photos of your mail to see them here.

privacyModal.title: Your Privacy Matters
privacyModal.description: Images are processed temporarily and deleted in 24 hours. Only text summaries are stored. We never sell your data.
